Read about childcare stipends- their purpose, the benefits of providing them, peers who are already offering them, and a guide on how to implement them at your company.

Executives Partnering to Invest in Children (EPIC) enables the business community to build the workforce of tomorrow while supporting the workforce of today by providing tailored consulting to define and develop custom childcare solutions for employers. They launched an Employer Child Care Navigator, which is a first-of-its-kind national tool to match the needs of employeers with childcare providers and vendors they need to support their childcare goals.

Discover the truth behind TV's portrayal of motherhood. Geena Davis Institute's study reveals a stark contrast between on-screen fiction and real-life diversity, challenges, and the invisible burdens mothers face.
Participate in the #ShowUsYourChildCare Campaign.

The Raising Child Care Fund is an initiative of Early Childhood Funders Collaborative that pools private foundation dollars to give grants to groups that lift up the voices of families, early educators, and allies—working alongside them to build powerful coalitions to transform child care and expand equity.

Resource title: The opportunity for the hospitality industry
Resource description: OS Benefits empowers small businesses in the hospitality industry to offer comprehensive, pre-negotiated benefits that support the whole health of their employees. An OSB Membership unlocks access to a community partner network of benefits ranging from affordable health insurance to mental health, wellness and lifestyle perks, like family planning & support.

OS Benefits empowers small businesses in the hospitality industry to offer comprehensive, pre-negotiated benefits that support the whole health of their employees, including mental health, wellness and lifestyle perks, like family planning & support.

Patch Caregiving works with frontline employers to provide back-up care options that their employees need.

Bumo is a simple, tech-enabled solution for the modern, working parent that allows them to instantly book child care on their platform. They offer employer-sponsored options to help employees get the care they need when they need it.

LUMO Leadership gives leading organizations the roadmap to cultivating a thriving, enduring workforce. Because supporting your employees through a parental transition and beyond isn’t just good to do — it’s good for business.

Lions & Tigers offers professional staffing & workforce solutions to Fortune 500s & startups. They design custom teams with full-time & fractional support from highly-skilled communications, marketing, operations, and change specialists for ongoing engagements and deliverable-based projects. They center mothers and BIPOC professionals in their model to keep people in the workforce, driving innovation and profitability. Their mission is to co-design a more human and valued work experience advancing impact, access & belonging.

If you offer care, recoup costs through the employer-provided childcare credit.

OnsiteKids develops and operates modular early learning centers and delivers joyful, equity-based early education and care as an employer-subsidized benefit specifically designed for frontline workers. OnSiteKids bakes flexibility and affordability into their model so employers who have been scared away by expensive, inflexible, and outdated care options can pilot a new approach to start small, learn fast, and grow with the workforce.

Upwards works with employers to craft innovative childcare solutions, outside of on-site care. Upwards partners with employers and governments to make care accessible to all families, and empower the caregivers who provide it. They partner with top companies to solve childcare challenges for the modern workforce — without building onsite centers.

ReadyNation focuses on the importance of early childhood development and can provide insights on how businesses can support their employees.

Wellthy’s human-led, tech-powered experience gives employees the personal expertise and navigational tools they need to care for themselves and their circle of loved ones. With hundreds of full-time care experts, Wellthy supports employees from birth through bereavement and every care need in between.

The Fifth Trimester and Vivvi's report, The R.O.I. of Caregiving Benefits, shows that childcare benefits are more than just a nice thing to do-they’re a business imperative. The reserach offers 5 key insights that show that parenthood motivates workers to be productive profit-drivers for their employers, and that workplace support for caregivers pays off.

Wellthy works with some of the biggest employers and most committed companies when it comes to supporting caregivers in today’s workforce. They've built a refreshed and reimagined back-up care solution—one that is more inclusive, flexible, and reliable for employees.

Upwards works with employers to craft innovative childcare solutions, including emergency back-up care. Upwards partners with over 100,000 providers so families can choose from a variety of caregiver types across all 50 states. They partner with top companies to solve childcare challenges for the modern workforce.
